parameters.content:
# ðŸ”— Backlink Linkfinder AI - Outbound Link Prospecting

**What it does:** Searches Google for websites ranking on specific keywords, extracts and verifies contact emails from those domains, then automatically adds qualified prospects to your email outreach campaign for backlink opportunities.

**Input:** Google Sheet with search keywords (one per row in "vs bright data" column)

**Output:** Verified contacts automatically added to Instantly.ai campaign with personalization data

**Scalability:** Processes unlimited keywords in batches of 15, with up to 30 websites per keyword

**Setup:**
1. Get API key from https://linkfinderai.com
2. Get API key from https://apify.com
3. Get API key from https://instantly.ai
4. Replace API keys in the workflow:
   - LinkFinder AI key in HTTP Request37 node (Bearer token)
   - Apify token in HTTP Request36 and HTTP Request1 nodes
   - Instantly.ai key in HTTP Request node
5. Connect your Google Sheet (or use the template: `1ytnEv_PbAATKmkHPwH-aMRzUmDyNwsZbnpP0ik0Kw8w`)
6. Update the Instantly.ai campaign ID in HTTP Request node
7. Test with a few keywords first

**Services used:**
- **Apify:** Google SERP scraping, email verification
- **LinkFinder AI:** company_name_to_email
- **Instantly.ai:** Campaign management and lead upload
- **Google Sheets:** Input management and tracking

**Perfect for:**
- SEO agencies doing outbound link building
- Content marketers seeking guest posting opportunities
- Digital PR teams building backlink campaigns
- Link builders prospecting at scale
- Outreach specialists automating list building

**Key Features:**
- Multi-format email extraction and validation
- Automatic domain cleaning (handles all TLD formats)
- Email deliverability verification before outreach
- Intelligent batching to respect API rate limits
- Personalization data included (title, website, company name)
- Error handling to ensure workflow continuity
